backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata listing feature IDs, associated files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for many frontend files describing their roles in the appâ€™s flow, pages, effects, components, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Defines global CSS variables, light/dark theme tokens, and base Tailwind-applied styles for the application.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx as the entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling page transitions and wrapping the app with MusicProvider and FlowProvider.
frontend/src/components/audio/MusicProvi: Implements a React context that manages background audio playback with toggle control and lifecycle cleanup.
frontend/src/components/audio/MusicToggl: Provides a floating button that toggles background music and visually reflects play state.
frontend/src/components/controls/BackToL: Renders a fixed-position button that triggers returning to the landing page via flow context.
frontend/src/components/controls/Romanti: Styled wrapper around the UI Button component applying gradient romantic-themed visuals and animations.
frontend/src/components/effects/CursorPe: Canvas effect that spawns and animates falling petals following mouse movement, disabled on touch or reduced-motion devices.
frontend/src/components/effects/FallingF: Canvas background drawing continuously falling rose or tulip petals with configurable variant and speed.
frontend/src/components/effects/Floating: Creates floating animated heart emoji elements positioned randomly inside a container.
frontend/src/components/effects/Sparkles: Canvas overlay rendering subtle twinkling sparkles that animate opacity for a shimmer effect.
frontend/src/components/forms/RiddleCard: Card component showing a riddle with an input, error display, and submit button with shake animation.
frontend/src/components/media/SessionIma: Lets users upload an image via hidden file input and previews it in a styled square button.
frontend/src/components/note/Handwritten: Displays a handwritten-style note inside a styled card.
frontend/src/components/typography/Flora: Large gradient-animated title text component with decorative styling.
frontend/src/content/strings.ts: Contains all static text strings for landing, riddle, intermediate, and final pages.
frontend/src/flow/FlowProvider.tsx: Manages app flow state, attempts, and uploaded photos with sessionStorage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity with login, clear, and identity loading logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty module noting no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles, fonts, Tailwind layers, and custom animations for UI effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/FinalPage.tsx: Final page showing a note and allowing the user to upload a final photo with decorative effects.
frontend/src/pages/IntermediatePage.tsx: Intermediate message page guiding user to continue to the final step.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with animated floral title, subtitle, and button to start the riddle flow.
frontend/src/pages/RiddlePage.tsx: Riddle page handling answer logic, attempts, and transitions to final or intermediate steps.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom fonts, OKLCH-based color variables, extended animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a romantic multi-page flow, aesthetic guidelines, animations, and notes on image handling and feature requirements.
